oai_dc:dc.dc:title: West Viriginia veterans medal of Wesley McDonald, Co. E, 6th W. Va. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Medals such as these were given to Union veterans from West Virginia. McDonald served in the 6th W. Va. Inf. Regt., USA. After his initial enlistment expired he reenlisted in December 1863 and served until June 1865. The regiment spent most of the war guarding the Baltimore & Ohio Railroad from Confederate cavalry and guerilla attacks.
